name: pixie-image-editor
description: A modern web-based image editor with Photoshop-inspired dark theme interface

scripts.build: cd frontend && npx lessc assets/less/main.less assets/css/main.css
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.compile:css: cd frontend && npx lessc assets/less/main.less assets/css/main.css
scripts.compile:css:minify: cd frontend && npx lessc assets/less/main.less assets/css/main.css --clean-css

author.name: Le Thi Nha My
author.university: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HCMUT)
